subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The former Penn State football coach Joe Paterno gave full ownership of his house to his wife, Sue, for $1 in July, less than four months before a sexual abuse scandal engulfed the university.
snippet: The former Penn State football coach Joe Paterno gave full ownership of his house to his wife, Sue, for $1 in July, less than four months before a sexual abuse scandal engulfed the university.
